name: SBBS - 1 Week Solo Jam
description:
This game is currently on hold in development as other projects have taken priority.

This was my attempt at making a 2D platformer game from scratch to learn about complex animation states, advanced UI components, and level design.

I hope you enjoy what there currently is and rest assured i will be returning to this project in time.

So without further ado, I present a slightly buggy and overly silent pre-alpha version!

This game still has many unfinished elements such as options implementation, audio implementation and the occasional bug.
